data.title: Konopielka (1982)
data.meta_description: Not much happens in the Polish village where Kaziuk (Krzysztof Majchrzak) and his family live. But that all changes when a gorgeous stranger (Joanna Sienkiewicz) appears in town. She's a schoolteacher with plenty of modern ideas, which quickly take hold of Kaziuk -- who is more than a little smitten. Overcome by heated fantasies about the fetching newcomer, Kaziuk lashes out, defying hallowed cultural traditions. Coming out of the blue, his actions cause an uproar among the villagers.
